questions.prompt: You receive an email from your bank telling you to log in to your account and update your contact information.  What should you do?

In your email settings, which of these features should be disabled?

answers: Sure, it's from a trusted vendor
Maybe, if it was signed by someone I knew
If it looked similar to others I have received from the vendor
Heck no!  That is probably a phishing attempt!
